13.content:
That's it, you lost almost your money buying aliments for the next week, it's time for you to TAKE a job, whatever it takes.
You go back home from the mall, make your lunch, then you do a refreshing shower and dress the most elegant clothes you have, take the journal and go find yourself a job, you got no car, so you're going by feet, on the way to the shop you think need a man, a girl comes out from a bar next to you and crashes on you, making you wet with her coffee "Perfect, just my luck!" you say, then you hear a familiar voice speaking to you "I'm so sorry i wasn't paying attention, i'm going to pay the laundry for you" so you raise your and and say to the girl "that's ok it..." you freeze when you see her, IT'S HER! the girl from that birthday party! Flavinia!! so you try to face her and say "hmm do you remember me?" the girl raise her hand to the mouth for the surprise, remaining silent for a second then finally say "OH IT'S YOU! where have you been? everyone didn't have a clue on where you disappeared to!" so you explain how you've got your grand-father house, and that you're searching for work; "oh, you're searching for work? now i understand why you're so formal today" giggling a bit for the observation, you on the other hand didn't catch the joke and look puzzled so you only say "yeah, that's it...hey do you know of any job around here?" Flavinia's eyes shine on this phrase, and aswer "well, maybe i have a job for you, follow me to my apartment and we'll talk about that" you only nod and follow her in a taxi, and remain silent for the entire travel while she observe you.
You finally arrive to Flavinia's house, she let's you relax and bring coffee for the two of you then she speak to you "i have an offer..."
